The three veicles cmposig Megatron slowed and combined, the largr craft now=
 pitching up and flying upward faster.=A0 It hummed as its weapons powered =
up and went into standby, preparing for a fire fight the moment he reached =
the end of the tunnel.

ntile Transformers were pathetic, all they could do was stall.=A0

In the distance light began streaming into the tunnel that=
 Megatron flew, trailed as he was by Kup and Grimlock. In the distance the =
tunnel began to rise sharply as it drew towards the surface and the light a=
bove. It would seem that Megatron was soon arriving at his destination. 

(=

 something unforseen)

<DIV>> "Who cares?" Megatron answered as he flew on.  "Let him stall,<BR>> buy time.  I'd rather he make themot of it beofre I slag him."<BR>> <BR>> In he end it wouldn't matter.  he would rather destroy all oppostion<BR>> while recoverg Rodimus time, simply because it was simple.  And<BR>> he scarsely doubted anythin back coul happen now.  He knewh<BR>> could react rapidly to a sudden change and easily overcome it.  This<BR>> infantile Transformers were pathetic, all they could do was stall. <BR>> Never turn him away.<BR><BR>In the distance light began streaming into the tunnel that Megatron flew, trailed as he was by Kup and Grimlock. In the distance the tunnel began to rise sharply as it drew towards the surface and the light above. It would seem that Megatron was soon arriving at his destination. <BR><BR>(OOC: Yep, both groups should be showing up on each
 other's sensors, barring something unforseen)<BR><BR>Preston<BR><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
